body.noscript: You need to enable JavaScript to run this app.

div.class: flex items-center flex-col justify-center min-h-screen bg-white sm:bg-gray-100
px-8 py-6 mt-4 text-left bg-white sm:shadow-lg w-full sm:rounded sm:w-1/3

h3.class: text-2xl mb-4 font-medium font-gotham-rounded-medium text-center text-secondary-900

div.div: Your new password must be different from previously used passwords

input.class: bg-white border border-secondary-300 text-body rounded focus:ring-0 outline-none focus:outline-none focus:border-secondary-500 block w-full pr-4 py-2 font-gotham-rounded-book text-medium pl-4 undefined
input.name: password

div.class: absolute inset-y-0 right-0 pr-3 flex items-center text-sm leading-5

input.class: bg-white border border-secondary-300 text-body rounded focus:ring-0 outline-none focus:outline-none focus:border-secondary-500 block w-full pr-4 py-2 font-gotham-rounded-book text-medium pl-4 undefined
input.name: confirm_password

div.class: absolute inset-y-0 right-0 pr-3 flex items-center text-sm leading-5

button.class: primary-button text-white border border-transparent text-white text-center rounded py-2.5 px-4 w-full transition ease-in-out duration-200 focus:outline-none uppercase font-gotham-rounded-medium

a.class: flex justify-center cursor-pointer font-gotham-rounded-book font-normal text-xs text-secondary-900 hover:text-secondary-900
